about_the_game:
Cosmic Rollers Orbital Odyssey



Embark on an infinite, thrilling journey through the depths of space in Cosmic Rollers Orbital Odyssey! Navigate a mesmerizing golden transparent trail as you roll your boulder through the cosmic expanse, dodging other boulders in a challenging and never-ending adventure.

Gameplay Highlights:

Space Trail Challenge: Roll your boulder along a golden transparent trail in the vastness of outer space, facing off against an ever-increasing challenge.

Dodging Obstacles: Dodge and weave through other boulders hurtling through space, testing your reflexes and agility.

Infinite Odyssey: Engage in a never-ending journey where the challenge escalates as you roll further along the cosmic path.

Key Features:

Infinite Space Adventure: Experience a captivating, never-ending cosmic journey as you roll your boulder along the celestial trail.

Challenging Gameplay: Test your skills by dodging other boulders along the way, maneuvering through an ever-more-demanding cosmic path.

Perspectacles Integration: For an immersive experience, Cosmic Rollers Orbital Odyssey is configured to seamlessly integrate with Perspectacles head tracking glasses. Dive into the cosmos and experience the thrill of rolling through space as Perspectacles provide an unparalleled level of immersion and control.

Take on the challenge, roll your boulder through the cosmic trail, and embark on an endless journey through space in Cosmic Rollers Orbital Odyssey!

Note: Perspectacles head tracking glasses are recommended for an immersive experience but not required to play the game.
detailed_description:
Enhanced for Perspectacles:

This game is optimized for Perspectacles, exclusive spatial tech glasses. While not required, they offer enhanced features.
To learn more or purchase Perspectacles, visit 3Di World.

name: Cosmic Rollers: Orbital Odyssey

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows Vista or greater
  • Processor: 1 GHz
  • Memory: 500 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 256 mb video memory, shader model 3.0+
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
